metadata.description: Complete SDD software development lifecycle with spec-driven workflows, autonomous feature orchestration, quality validation, and performance monitoring.

plugins.name: specswarm
plugins.description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.3.2: FIXED - Simplified Skills to only invoke slash commands (prevents over-execution). v3.3.1: Natural language via Skills architecture. v3.3.0: Natural language commands, confidence-based execution. v3.2.0: Multi-language support. Core features: 4 high-level commands, 70% workflow simplification, full backward compatibility.
